title: Honda VT series
text:
The Honda VT series comprises <a href="motorbikes">motorbikes</a> with two-cylinder <a href="V%20engine">V engine</a>s. More sporting <a href="V%20engine">V engine</a>d bikes are given "<a href="Honda%20VTR%20series">VTR</a>" model numbers. Four-cylinder V-engined Hondas are designated <a href="Honda%20VF%20and%20VFR">VF or VFRs</a>, while Honda motorbikes with inline engines mostly belong to the <a href="Honda%20CB%20series">CB</a> and <a href="Honda%20CBR%20series">CBR</a> series.
Just because an engine is listed within a series or sub-series doesn't mean it is directly related to another within the same category.
Honda's 90-Degree VT Series
Honda's 52-Degree VT Series
Honda's 45-Degree VT Series
